Html:
Hi,

I am trying to get a list of sheets inside one excel workbook but i can't find any documentation about this issue anywhere.

Does anyone know how to get the list? Thanks.

If you view the contents of the /Documentation/API folder from the distribution, you'll find the API documents... this should detail every method call

What you're after is:

$objPHPExcel->getSheetNames();

which will return an array of all the worksheet names in the workbook
